sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import axios from "axios" import { useAuth } from "../context/UserContext" const FarmerDashboard = () => { const { user, logout } = useAuth() const [weatherData, setWeatherData] = useState(null) const [products, setProducts] = useState([]) const [equipmentRequests, setEquipmentRequests] = useState([]) const [transportRequests, setTransportRequests] = useState([]) const [orders, setOrders] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("dashboard") useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { try { // Fetch weather data for farmer's location const weatherResponse = await axios.get(`http://localhost:8000/api/weather/data/?location=${user.location}`) setWeatherData(weatherResponse.data.length > 0 ? weatherResponse.data[0] : null) // Fetch farmer's products const productsResponse = await axios.get("http://localhost:8000/api/products/my_products/") setProducts(productsResponse.data) // Fetch equipment requests const equipmentResponse = await axios.get("http://localhost:8000/api/equipment/rentals/") setEquipmentRequests(equipmentResponse.data) // Fetch transport requests const transportResponse = await axios.get("http://localhost:8000/api/transports/my_requests/") setTransportRequests(transportResponse.data) // Fetch orders for farmer's products const ordersResponse = await axios.get("http://localhost:8000/api/products/orders/") setOrders(ordersResponse.data) setLoading(false) } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching farmer data:", error) setLoading(false) } } fetchData() }, [user.location]) const handleLogout = () => { logout() } return (

Farmer Dashboard

Welcome, {user.first_name} {user.last_name}
{loading ? (

Loading data...

) : ( <> {activeTab === "dashboard" && (

Overview

Products

{products.length}

setActiveTab("marketplace")}> Manage Products

Equipment Requests

{equipmentRequests.length}

setActiveTab("equipment")}> View Requests

Transport Requests

{transportRequests.length}

setActiveTab("transport")}> View Requests

Orders

{orders.length}

setActiveTab("marketplace")}> View Orders
{weatherData && (

Current Weather in {user.location}

Temperature: {weatherData.temperature}Â°C

Condition: {weatherData.weather_condition}

Rainfall: {weatherData.rainfall} mm

)}

Recent Activity

{orders.slice(0, 3).map((order) => (

New order for {order.product_details.name} from {order.buyer_details.username}

{new Date(order.created_at).toLocaleDateString()}
))} {equipmentRequests.slice(0, 3).map((request) => (

Equipment request {request.status} for {request.equipment_details.name}

{new Date(request.created_at).toLocaleDateString()}
))}
)} {activeTab === "weather" && (

Weather Information

{weatherData ? (

{user.location} Weather

{weatherData.weather_condition === "Clear" && "â˜€ï¸"} {weatherData.weather_condition === "Cloudy" && "â˜ï¸"} {weatherData.weather_condition === "Rain" && "ðŸŒ§ï¸"} {weatherData.weather_condition === "Storm" && "â›ˆï¸"}
{weatherData.temperature}Â°C
Humidity {weatherData.humidity}%
Wind Speed {weatherData.wind_speed} km/h
Rainfall {weatherData.rainfall} mm

Farming Tips Based on Weather

    {weatherData.rainfall > 10 && (
  • Heavy rainfall expected. Consider postponing outdoor activities and ensure proper drainage in fields.
    • )} {weatherData.temperature > 30 && (
  • High temperatures expected. Ensure adequate irrigation for crops and shade for livestock.
    • )} {weatherData.temperature < 10 && (
  • Low temperatures expected. Protect sensitive crops from frost and ensure livestock have warm shelter.
    • )} {weatherData.wind_speed > 20 && (
  • Strong winds expected. Secure loose items and consider postponing spraying activities.
    • )}
) : (

No weather data available for your location.

)}
)} {activeTab === "marketplace" && (

My Products

{products.length > 0 ? ( products.map((product) => (

{product.name}

{product.category}

{product.description.substring(0, 100)}...

${product.price} per {product.unit} Available: {product.quantity} {product.unit}
)) ) : (

You haven't added any products yet.

)}

Orders for My Products

{orders.length > 0 ? ( orders.map((order) => (

Order #{order.id}

Product: {order.product_details.name}

Quantity: {order.quantity} {order.product_details.unit}

Total: ${order.total_price}

Buyer: {order.buyer_details.username}

Status: {order.status}

Date: {new Date(order.created_at).toLocaleDateString()}

{order.status === "pending" && ( <> )} {order.status === "confirmed" && }
)) ) : (

No orders for your products yet.

)}
)} {activeTab === "equipment" && (

Equipment Rental

Available Equipment

{/* This would be populated from API */}

John Deere Tractor

Modern tractor suitable for large fields

Daily Rate: $150

Location: Central Farm

Combine Harvester

Efficient harvester for grain crops

Daily Rate: $200

Location: East County

My Equipment Requests

{equipmentRequests.length > 0 ? (
{equipmentRequests.map((request) => (

{request.equipment_details.name}

Status:{" "} {request.status}

Dates: {new Date(request.start_date).toLocaleDateString()} to{" "} {new Date(request.end_date).toLocaleDateString()}

Total Cost: ${request.total_cost}

{request.status === "pending" && (
)}
))}
) : (

You haven't made any equipment rental requests yet.

)}
)} {activeTab === "transport" && (

Transportation Services

Available Transportation

{/* This would be populated from API */}

10-Ton Delivery Truck

Large capacity truck for bulk transport

Rate: $2/km

Location: Central District

Refrigerated Van

Temperature-controlled for perishable goods

Rate: $3/km

Location: North County

My Transportation Requests

{transportRequests.length > 0 ? (
{transportRequests.map((request) => (

Transport Request #{request.id}

From: {request.pickup_location}

To: {request.delivery_location}

Cargo: {request.cargo_description}

Weight: {request.weight} kg

Pickup Date: {new Date(request.pickup_date).toLocaleString()}

Status:{" "} {request.status}

{request.status === "pending" && (
)}
))}
) : (

You haven't made any transportation requests yet.

)}
)} {activeTab === "education" && (

Educational Resources

â–¶

Modern Farming Techniques

Learn about the latest farming methods to increase yield and sustainability.

15:30

â–¶

Pest Management

Effective strategies for managing pests while minimizing chemical use.

12:45

â–¶

Soil Health Management

Understanding and improving soil health for better crop yields.

18:20

â–¶

Water Conservation Techniques

Methods to optimize water usage in farming operations.

14:15

)} )}
) } export default FarmerDashboard
